properties.name: geoserver.root
properties.description: Root URL under which the GeoServer REST interface is available.

properties.name: geoserver.auth.password
properties.description: Authentication password for the GeoServer instance.

properties.name: geoserver.auth.username
properties.description: User to authenticate on the GeoServer intstance.

properties.name: geoserver.workspace
properties.description: Name of the GeoServer workspace used to store shapefiles, layers, etc.
